p: Now that we have a method of converting from unreported deaths to unreported cases, we continue by estimating unreported deaths from the SDB data. Community deaths overall can be classified using a dichotomous tree, reflecting their interaction with the SDB program and their Ebola status ( Fig 1). The structure of the tree makes it possible to estimate the total unreported non-hospitalized Ebola deaths in a district and week, d, based upon the corresponding number of Ebola positive and negative burials conducted by the SDB program, combined with estimates of background mortality.
